name: 4D Toys
description: 4D Toys: A box of toys from the fourth dimension.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Higher Processor: VR: Intel Core i5 4590 equivalent or greater. Non-VR: Core i7-4960HQ @ 2.60GHz equivalent or greater Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: VR: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater. Non-VR: Gefore GT 750M equivalent or greater Storage: 160 MB available space
